body_html: I probably won't have time to add a new kernel, so if anyone else wants to take that on feel free. In the meantime I squashed all the commits for readability as requested (just keeping implementation 2). The alternate implementations are preserved at https://github.com/drasmuss/tensorflow/tree/dynamic_stitch_grad_copy if anyone wants to look at them in the future.

body: I probably won't have time to add a new kernel, so if anyone else wants to take that on feel free.  In the meantime I squashed all the commits for readability as requested (just keeping implementation 2).  The alternate implementations are preserved at https://github.com/drasmuss/tensorflow/tree/dynamic_stitch_grad_copy if anyone wants to look at them in the future.
